alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 10:51AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Monroe and Lenawee Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1049 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of stronger winds near Blissfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This stronger winds will be near... Blissfield around 1105 AM EDT. Ottawa Lake around 1115 AM EDT. Lambertville around 1130 AM EDT. Temperance around 1135 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these winds include Seneca, Lime Creek, Munson, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, Toledo Beach, Erie, Palmyra, Sand Creek and Samaria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
